name: there is a field and you are no longer in it
name_original: there is a field and you are no longer in it
description:
Made for September Bitsy Jam: Field Guide. 

Done under 2.5 hours. 

It's about a field in a forest. 

It's about you and a baseball player.

It's about nothing.

It's about something.

Writing and Music done in Bitsy.

Arrow keys / WASD to move around.

(191022, 2118) - oh dear there are a few typos. this is what happens when you leave stuff to the last minute.
